org.magelan.drawing.markup
Interface MarkupViewer

All Superinterfaces:
DrawingViewer
All Known Subinterfaces:
DrawingEditor
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDrawingEditor, DefaultMarkupViewer
public interface MarkupViewer
extends DrawingViewer

The default markup drawing viewer implementation.

Version:
1.0, 04/2004
Author:
Assen Antov

void setSelectionDecorator(SelectionDecorator decorator)

getSelectionDecorator

SelectionDecorator getSelectionDecorator()
Returns the current selection decorator.

Returns:

getSelection

java.util.List getSelection()
Returns the current selection. Note that resulting list instances are immutable.

Returns:
the current selection

setSelection

void setSelection(java.util.List selection)
Sets a new selection. The elements from the parameter list will be copied to the internal selection list. Note that no check is made whether the elements from the list are actually added to the drawing or not.

Parameters:
selection - new selection

select

void select(java.util.List elements)
Adds the list of elements to the selection. Note that no check is made whether the elements from the list are actually added to the drawing or not.

Parameters:
elements - elements to select

deselect

void deselect(java.util.List elements)
Removes the specified elements from the selection.

Parameters:
elements - list of elements to deselect
